Key Match Events: India made 133 runs after losing 9 wickets
David Miller and Aiden Markram set the momentum for South Africa
Arshdeep Singh took 2 wickets but could not save the game
Post-Match Reflections: 'Not Good Enough': Rohit Sharma on India's defeat
'This was one of my biggest dreams': Lungi Ngidi
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Perth, Australia
Others: The match was part of the 2022 T20I World Cup
